title: She Provokes Purpose
features: Break that stagnant atmosphere with purposeful prayer, poetry and affirmation. Through prayer, poetry, affirmations, scripture and journal prompts this book is a heartfelt resource empowering women to create an atmosphere that provokes purpose by speaking God's word.
description: Charday Cherie' Wilson is a Wife and Mother of 3 who resides in Memphis, TN. She is the Founder and Content Writer at her personal blog, Charday On Purpose. In addition to writing on her blog she is also a freelance writer, having written for publications such as WOMAN LIVE, MEMPHIS PARENT and others. Charday is a Writer, Poet, Worship Dancer and Speaker who has a passion for showing the heart of God through the Creative Arts and Authentic ministry. Her mission is to empower everyday women to seek God's authentic purpose for their lives, restore hearts back to God and to help women create space in their life for God to be maximized.
